'''13w07a''' is the tenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.5]], released on February 14, 2013.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/02/minecraft-snapshot-13w07a/</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''NBT'''
* <code>FallingSand</code> can be edited using an NBT now called <code>TileEntityData</code>. 
* The players can change the sand to other tile entities.

=== General ===
'''[[Lighting]]'''
* Slight optimizations.

'''[[Minecraft Realms]]'''
* Updated the (currently unused) ''Minecraft Online'' localization strings, changing the name of the service to ''Minecraft Realms''.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w07a|prefix=Snapshot
|;old
|2196|Map item placed in item frame experiences Z-fighting.
|;dev

|9212|Team colors/prefixes/suffixes are not displayed with @a/@p/@r.
